long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Scribe extension allows you to easily create summaries from any YouTube video in the form of a well written article that you can publish to your own blog or website.

Note:
Clicking the "Summarize Video" will start the process of creating the summary from the YouTube video, and then redirect you to the Scribe website where you can read and copy the summary.
